main event: A bright light, the size of a basketball, was observed over South San Antonio on 22 Jul 58, heading North at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The sighting involved a very bright light moving quickly across the sky., The size of the observed object was compared to a basketball., The incident was recorded in a Project Blue Book report., The sighting is inferred to relate to aircraft in the vicinity., There were no photographs included with the report.
witness description: sightings were made from the ground
